name: Ghastly Gundown
description:
Submission for Eterjam Uruguay 2019

Ghastly Gundown is a whac-a-mole fast paced action game that takes place in a wicked storage room.

Tap on creatures to banish them and avoid getting scared!

Authors

Art: Nicolas de Leon and Abigail Tegiacchi

Special thanks to Maru Silveira

Music & SFX: Santiago Ramos

Code: dasPanjo and jvolonte
